exceptions.tactic: intros p Hp n x H.
intros p' Hp n x H.
intros p' Hp' n x H.
intros p' Hp' n' x H.
intros p' Hp' n' x' H.

exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "i ⊗ x" in the current goal.
In environment p : nat Hp : p = 0 -> False n : nat x, i : Z_Zp Hi : i ⊗ x = Op Unable to unify "exists i : Z_Zp, i ⊗ (?M1651 ⊗ ?M1652) = Op" with "mscal Zp_mult Op n i ⊗ mscal Zp_mult Op n x = Op".

original: intros p Hp n x H. unfold Zp_invertible in *. destruct H as [i Hi]. exists (mscal Zp_mult Op n i). rewrite Hi. apply Zp_mult_invertible; auto.
